author: paulkwon72 .
title: Great place to stay in Manhattan
text:
It was really great to stay with my family and very easy to move to everywhere. You can find the supermarket next to the hotel as well. I will stay here again next time, and strongly recommend to everyone who is looking for the best hotel in Manhattan
Room Tip: So clean, comfortable, and great kitchen !! See more room tips
